mapper.select:
select P.idx, I.name, I.seller_text, I.product_img, I.review_count, P.pType, R.info_idx, L.city, L.gu, min(R.price) as price from info I join product P on P.idx = I.idx join room R on R.info_idx = I.idx join location L on L.idx = P.location_idx join theme T on t.info_idx = i.idx
L.category = #{category} and P.pType = #{pType} and R.human_count >= #{human_count}
and op1 = 'y'
and op2 = 'y'
and op3 = 'y'
and op4 = 'y'
and op5 = 'y'
and op6 = 'y'
and op7 = 'y'
and op8 = 'y'
group by P.idx, I.name, I.seller_text, I.product_img, I.review_count, P.pType, R.info_idx, L.city, L.gu order by price
